languages.text: Поверхность покрыта мириадом царапин, в которых угадывается некий смысл. Кто-то сначала начертил непонятные вам символы, а затем исказил их, дорисовав лишние штрихи и линии.
The surface is covered in countless scratches, and you can discern some logic in them. Someone began by scratching strange symbols, but then defaced them, adding extra marks and lines.
languages.original_text: Поверхность покрыта мириадом царапин, в которых угадывается некий смысл. Кто-то сначала начертил непонятные вам символы, а затем исказил их, дорисовав лишние штрихи и линии.

traits.locale_text: The surface is covered in countless scratches, and you can discern some logic in them. Someone began by scratching strange symbols, but then defaced them, adding extra marks and lines.
The surface is covered in countless scratches, and you can discern some logic in them. Someone began by scratching strange symbols, but then defaced them, adding extra marks and lines.
The surface is covered in countless scratches, and you can discern some logic in them. Someone began by scratching strange symbols, but then defaced them, adding extra marks and lines.
The surface is covered in countless scratches, and you can discern some logic in them. Someone began by scratching strange symbols, but then defaced them, adding extra marks and lines.

languages.text: 它的表面布满了划痕，你看出了这些划痕的规律。某个人一开始在上面刻下了古怪的符号，但随后便划掉了这些符号，又在上面刻下了新的记号与线条。
languages.original_text: The surface is covered in countless scratches, and you can discern some logic in them. Someone began by scratching strange symbols, but then defaced them, adding extra marks and lines.

traits.locale_text: 它的表面布满了划痕，你看出了这些划痕的规律。某个人一开始在上面刻下了古怪的符号，但随后便划掉了这些符号，又在上面刻下了新的记号与线条。

languages.text: La superficie está cubierta de arañazos y logras discernir la lógica que los forma. Alguien empezó por tallar unos símbolos extraños y luego los intentó destruir añadiendo más marcas y líneas.
languages.original_text: The surface is covered in countless scratches, and you can discern some logic in them. Someone began by scratching strange symbols, but then defaced them, adding extra marks and lines.

traits.locale_text: La superficie está cubierta de arañazos y logras discernir la lógica que los forma. Alguien empezó por tallar unos símbolos extraños y luego los intentó destruir añadiendo más marcas y líneas.

languages.text: 表面は無数の傷で覆われており、そこには何らかの論理が読みとれた。誰かが奇妙な記号を刻み始めたものの、その後、余分な印や線を付け加えて見えづらくした。
languages.original_text: The surface is covered in countless scratches, and you can discern some logic in them. Someone began by scratching strange symbols, but then defaced them, adding extra marks and lines.

traits.locale_text: 表面は無数の傷で覆われており、そこには何らかの論理が読みとれた。誰かが奇妙な記号を刻み始めたものの、その後、余分な印や線を付け加えて見えづらくした。

languages.text: Die Oberfläche ist von unzähligen Kratzern bedeckt, die aber einer gewissen Logik folgen. Jemand hat mit seltsamen Symbolen begonnen, diese aber dann unleserlich gemacht und zusätzliche Zeichen und Linien hinzugefügt.
languages.original_text: The surface is covered in countless scratches, and you can discern some logic in them. Someone began by scratching strange symbols, but then defaced them, adding extra marks and lines.

traits.locale_text: Die Oberfläche ist von unzähligen Kratzern bedeckt, die aber einer gewissen Logik folgen. Jemand hat mit seltsamen Symbolen begonnen, diese aber dann unleserlich gemacht und zusätzliche Zeichen und Linien hinzugefügt.

languages.text: La surface est recouverte de lacérations. L'on peut d'ailleurs déceler une certaine logique dans leur disposition. Quelqu'un a commencé par graver des symboles étranges, puis les a altérés en y ajoutant des marques et des lignes supplémentaires.
languages.original_text: The surface is covered in countless scratches, and you can discern some logic in them. Someone began by scratching strange symbols, but then defaced them, adding extra marks and lines.

traits.locale_text: La surface est recouverte de lacérations. L'on peut d'ailleurs déceler une certaine logique dans leur disposition. Quelqu'un a commencé par graver des symboles étranges, puis les a altérés en y ajoutant des marques et des lignes supplémentaires.

languages.text: Bu yüzey sayısız çizikle kaplı olsa da bu çiziklerin ardındaki mantığı kısmen sezebiliyorsun. Birisi, tuhaf semboller çizmeye başlamış ancak ardından fazladan işaret ve çizgiler ekleyerek bu sembolleri bozmuş.
languages.original_text: The surface is covered in countless scratches, and you can discern some logic in them. Someone began by scratching strange symbols, but then defaced them, adding extra marks and lines.
